## Read the data
```{r}
state_data_served <- read_excel("data/afcars_state_data_tables_09thru18.xlsx", range = "Served!A8:K60")
head(state_data_served)
```

## Map Plot
https://socviz.co/maps.html
```{r}
library(maps)
us_states <- map_data("state")
head(us_states)
```

```{r}
library(mapproj)
ggplot(data = us_states, mapping = aes(x = long, y = lat, group = group, fill = region)) +
  geom_polygon(color = "gray90", size = 0.1) +
  coord_map(projection = "albers", lat0 = 39, lat1 = 45) +
  guides(fill=FALSE)
```
